short_summary: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP),Supply Arrangement - W8485-184741 Series,Aviation Replacement Parts.
description: The Department of National Defence is required to acquire 1 item for the CT114.  This RFP is open to Qualified Supply Arrangement (SA) Holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.  Only 8 Companies are involved in this RFP: Simex Defence Inc, Tower Aerospace,Unisource Technology Inc, L3 Technologies MAS Inc, Canada West Avionics,  Tronosjet Maintenance Inc, Tulmar Safety, Honeywell Ltd, Rockwell Collins Canada, TSL Aerospace Technologies.  The RFP document will be sent to the appropriate companies via e-mail directly to the qualified SA holders being invited to bid. Bidders are advised that the Government Electronics Tendering System (GETS) is not responsible for the distribution of the RFP documents
full_summary:
## Aviation Replacement Parts Supply Arrangement
### Solicitation: W8485-237157/A

**Public Notice**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified suppliers to participate in a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Aviation Replacement Parts under Supply Arrangement (SA) W8485-184741 Series.

**Background**
The DND requires the acquisition of 1 item for the CT114, as specified by the Directorate of Aerospace Procurement (DAP) 5-2-7-2. This RFP is open only to Qualified SA Holders who are registered with the Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series.

**Invited Companies**
The following companies have been invited to submit proposals:

* Simex Defence Inc.
* Tower Aerospace Inc.
* Unisource Technology Inc.
* L3 Technologies MAS Inc.
* Canada West Avionics
* Tronosjet Maintenance Inc.
* Tulmar Safety
* Honeywell Ltd
* Rockwell Collins Canada
* TSL Aerospace Technologies

**RFP Documents**
The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting Officer to the qualified SA Holders who are being invited to bid on this requirement.

**Inquiries**
Inquiries regarding this RFP requirement should be submitted to the Contracting Authority below:

* Ryan Duncan
* Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)
* Department of National Defence (DND) / Government of Canada
* 455, Boulvard de la carrière, Gatineau (QC) J8Y 6V7
* Ryan.Duncan@forces.gc.ca

**Ongoing Opportunity for Qualification**
A Notice will be posted at least once a year on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) to allow more suppliers to become qualified for Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 Series.

**Contact Information**
For all inquiries, please contact:

* Samantha Coles
* Supply Team Leader
* Government of Canada | Public Services and Procurement Canada
* Land and Aerospace Equipment Procurement and Support Sector
* Civilian Aircraft Division – CAG

Note: Our Division is currently teleworking due to COVID-19. The best way to contact us is by email.

samantha.coles@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice of Expiration**
This solicitation was due by November 1, 2022, 14:00:00. It is no longer open for bidding.  Avaialbe on GETS
